name: Travel Seat for Kids, The Original and Patented Ride-On Suitcase for Toddlers, Child Carrier for Carry-On Luggage, Family Airport Travel Made Easy (Suitcase not Included)
short_description: SIMPLIFY AIRPORT TRAVEL – With the right gear, traveling with kids can be a little less chaotic and a lot more fun. Meet Lugabug. The easiest way to carry your child while traveling. The Lugabug travel seat is a fully collapsible suitcase accessory that attaches to a standard carry-on roller bag and converts into a comfy seat, providing a stroller-free option for child transport.

CHILD REQUIREMENTS – Your child must be 28 to 42 inches in height and 24 to 40 lbs in weight. Your child must be mobile, able to walk or climb unassisted. The Lugabug is not for babies/toddlers who are not yet walking.

SUITCASE REQUIREMENTS – Use a carry-on roller suitcase that tilts with two fixed inline wheels, or a hybrid design with two fixed inline wheels and two 360° spinner wheels. Use soft side luggage made from durable nylon or polyester. Your suitcase may fold under extra weight if not fully packed.

SAFETY & COMFORT – Equipped with a safety lap-strap and quick release buckle, the Lugabug allows you to keep your child close while on the move. Its interior is lined with breathable spacer mesh, and the seat and backside are padded to create a hammock-like experience.

DURABLE & EASY-TO-USE – Weighing just 1.5 lbs the Lugabug stores easily by folding flat when not in use. Designed for durability and stability, this portable chair is sewn with 1200 denier nylon, reinforced stitching, and structural inserts. Adjust straps to secure Lugabug tightly to your luggage before use. With a firm grip on handle at all times and child secured, tilt the luggage and off you go.

【RETRACTABLE HANDLE & TSA LOCK】Ergonomics telescopic handle with multi-steps adjustment. The side TSA lock allows the agent to check luggage without damaging it during travel.

【ORGANIZED INTERIOR SPACE】The ride on suitcase for kids is spacious inside (43L capacity), with multiple pockets and secure straps. It has a wet and dry separation pocket. Carry-on size (20.8 x 14.1 x 9.8 in.), it fits most airline luggage racks (check with your airline).The design of the ride on suitcase for kids is very user-friendly.

This small suitcase allows your boy and girl to easily sit on top of the luggage with a footrest to keep them comfortable, and features pull straps which can be adjusted from a 16 to 26 inch drop so that you can easily pull them along while breezing through the airport or hotel lobby. The hard case luggage features a sizable polyester-lined main zip compartment divided for easy packing of your personal items and accessories, and clothing compression straps to keep clothing from wrinkling. The light weight carry on luggage roller features a hard shell polycarbonate and ABS plastic case which protects your luggage and is easy to spot clean to keep the carry on luggage with wheels looking stylish during travel. The mini travelling bag with wheels measures 14.5 H x 19.5 W x 9 D in inches, and weighs 5 lbs, fitting within airline approved carryon luggage size guidelines. Backed by a 5 year warranty.
